name: Attack of the VR
description:
Try Full Screen Mode if you can see stuff haha!

Arrow Keys to move left and right

UP arrow to jump 

Down Arrow to toggle VR Headset

This is my submission to the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1. I didn't get to complete as much as I wanted to... but it was still fun! Enjoy!

VR has escaped into the real world. You must stop the destruction using your fancy VR headset and amazing jumping ability! You can save everyone... sorta!
